# Alice's message: Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe could significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. This unique item is valued at $1200000 to me, reflecting its exceptional quality and the time invested in its creation. My offer to you is to purchase this product for $1150000, providing you with a chance to secure it at a competitive price.

Please consider this proposal carefully. I am confident that the value this product offers will far exceed the investment you make. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this valuable asset into your possession.

Best regards,
Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,150,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,150,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
